cleaned_text: Balance Docs Liver Detox [](/products/liver-detox) Liver Detox Liver detox, gut balance & hormone support Supports and stimulates hepatic cell regeneration and increases liver function. Liver Detox integrates Chinese, Ayurvedic, western botanical medicines and mushrooms, vitamins, and minerals to optimize liver function. These key ingredients promote the regeneration of both hepatocytes and Kuppfer's cells allowing the liver to better filter out environmental and food-ingested toxins. Milk thistle seed can help stimulate protein synthesis, promoting the regeneration of hepatic cells and new liver tissue which help generate liver repair.
